ygData.subject: Re: Hmm... Manners
ygData.msgSnippet: Yep, there are plenty of rude folks out there...in real life, so why would the game be any different? ;) However, in general, I ve found the game to be very
ygData.messageBody:
Yep, there are plenty of rude folks out
there...in real life, so why would the game be any
different? ;) However, in general, I've found the game to be
very rewarding and fun. I do think there should be
some limit on how many OOC's, SHOUTS, and AUCTIONS one
can send per hour. Of course my favorite is the
guy/gal begging for a SOW or a CLARITY, there are like 3
people in the zone, none of which are DRUIDS or
ENCHANTERS! Hello.../who is our friend! =) I normally will
send ONE OOC for Breeze or Clarity, and ALWAYS donate.
If I don't get any response, I send a polite tell to
a high level for Clarity...just one. If I don't get
a response, I simply try the next zone.
<br><br>CoJim ColoSpgs<br>Druid of the 25th Season, Prexus
Server.
